creator: er_conde@terra.es
text:
Created attachment 26680
Message properties file

There are many label untranslated in the apache JMeter GUI (e.g. CSV data set parameters, RandomVariable properties, etc.)
I have translated some properties files and these are attached.

creator: er_conde@terra.es
text:
Created attachment 26682
CSV Data Set properties file

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
The new files must include the Apache License 2.0 Header.
For modified files, the better way is to provide a diff patch. But for translation files, it's possible to provide the full properties file if you isn't familiar with diff patch. 
Please note: I18NEdit removes the Apache License Header, you must re-add after translation work.

I can modify your submission for add AL Header if you give me your agreement.

creator: er_conde@terra.es
text:
(In reply to comment #3)
> The new files must include the Apache License 2.0 Header.
> For modified files, the better way is to provide a diff patch. But for
> translation files, it's possible to provide the full properties file if you
> isn't familiar with diff patch. 
> Please note: I18NEdit removes the Apache License Header, you must re-add after
> translation work.
> 
> I can modify your submission for add AL Header if you give me your agreement.

Ok. Thanks. I'm going to include the AL header in these files and attach again. Thanks again.
